 28namespace vsip_csl
 29{
 30namespace dispatcher
 31{
 32
 33template <template <typename> class ReduceT>
 34struct ReduceOp { typedef op::reduce_idx<ReduceT> reduce_op; };
 35
 36template <>
 37struct ReduceOp<impl::Min_magsq_value>
 38{ typedef op::reduce_idx<impl::Min_value> reduce_op; };
 39template <>
 40struct ReduceOp<impl::Max_magsq_value>
 41{ typedef op::reduce_idx<impl::Max_value> reduce_op; };
 42
 43
 44template<template <typename> class ReduceT>
 45struct List<ReduceOp<ReduceT> >
 46{
 47  typedef Make_type_list<be::cvsip, be::mercury_sal, be::generic>::type type;
 48};
 49
 50} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
 51} // namespace vsip_csl
 52
 53namespace vsip
 54{
 55namespace impl
 56{
 57
 58template <typename                  ReduceT,
 59          typename                  T,
 60          dimension_type            Dim,
 61	  typename                  Block>
 62inline T
 63reduce_idx_blk(Block const& b, Index<Dim>& idx)
 64{
 65  using namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher;
 66  T r;
 67  typedef typename Block_layout<Block>::order_type order_type;
 68  typedef Make_type_list<be::cvsip,
 69                         be::mercury_sal,
 70                         be::generic>::type list_type;
 71
 72  Dispatcher<ReduceT,
 73             void(T&, Block const&, Index<Dim>&, order_type),
 74             list_type>::
 75    dispatch(r, b, idx, order_type());
 76
 77  return r;
 78}
 79
 80
 81template<template <typename> class ReduceT,
 82         typename T,
 83         typename Block, dimension_type Dim>
 84inline T
 85generic_par_idx_op(Block& a, Index<Dim>& idx)
 86{
 87  using namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher;
 88
 89  typedef Map<Block_dist>                          map_type;
 90  typedef Dense<1,T,row1_type,Map<> >              block_type;
 91  typedef Dense<1,Index<Dim>,row1_type,Map<> >     block_idx_type;
 92  typedef Dense<1,T,row1_type,Global_map<1> >          g_block_type;
 93  typedef Dense<1,Index<Dim>,row1_type,Global_map<1> > g_block_idx_type;
 94  typedef Vector<T,block_type>                     vect_type;
 95  typedef Vector<Index<Dim>,block_idx_type>        vect_idx_type;
 96
 97  Index<Dim>                                       my_res_idx;
 98  Index<Dim>                                       my_g_res_idx;
 99  Index<1>                                         global_res_idx;
100  T                                                global_res;
101
102  Vector<processor_type> a_proc_set       = a.map().processor_set();
103
104  // We will make two vectors, results, and results_idx. Results will hold
105  // the result of the reduction of each processor. The reults_idx will
106  // hold the index of the reduction of each processor.
107  Map<>                                   map(a_proc_set,a_proc_set.size());
108  vect_type                               results(a_proc_set.size(),map);
109  vect_idx_type                           results_idx(a_proc_set.size(),map);
110
111  if(a.map().subblock() != no_subblock) 
112  {
113    typename ReduceT<T>::result_type result = 
114      reduce_idx_blk<op::reduce_idx<ReduceT>,typename ReduceT<T>::result_type>
115        (get_local_block(a),my_res_idx);
116    results.local().put(0,result);
117    my_g_res_idx = global_from_local_index_blk(a,my_res_idx);
118    results_idx.local().put(0,my_g_res_idx);
119  }
120
121
122  // Ok, now, perform the same reduction on the local results
123
124  // first, make a vector with a global map that contains all the results
125  Vector<T,g_block_type>                  global_results(a_proc_set.size());
126  Vector<Index<Dim>,g_block_idx_type>     global_results_idx(a_proc_set.size());
127  // do broadcast
128  global_results     = results;
129  global_results_idx = results_idx;
130
131  global_res = reduce_idx_blk<typename ReduceOp<ReduceT>::reduce_op,
132                              typename ReduceT<T>::result_type>
133      (global_results.block(),global_res_idx);
134  idx = global_results_idx.get(global_res_idx[0]);
135
136  return global_res;
137
138}
139
140template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
141          dimension_type            Dim,
142          typename                  OrderT>
143struct Reduction_idx_supported
144{ static bool const value = false; };
145
146// All suppored reductions here
147template <dimension_type Dim, typename OrderT>
148struct Reduction_idx_supported<Max_value, Dim, OrderT>
149{ static bool const value = true; };
150
151template <dimension_type Dim, typename OrderT>
152struct Reduction_idx_supported<Min_value, Dim, OrderT>
153{ static bool const value = true; };
154
155template <dimension_type Dim, typename OrderT>
156struct Reduction_idx_supported<Max_mag_value, Dim, OrderT>
157{ static bool const value = true; };
158
159template <dimension_type Dim, typename OrderT>
160struct Reduction_idx_supported<Min_mag_value, Dim, OrderT>
161{ static bool const value = true; };
162
163template <dimension_type Dim, typename OrderT>
164struct Reduction_idx_supported<Max_magsq_value, Dim, OrderT>
165{ static bool const value = true; };
166
167template <dimension_type Dim, typename OrderT>
168struct Reduction_idx_supported<Min_magsq_value, Dim, OrderT>
169{ static bool const value = true; };
170
171} // namespace vsip::impl
172} // namespace vsip
173
174/**********************************************************************
175* Parallel evaluator for index returning reductions
176**********************************************************************/
177
178namespace vsip_csl
179{
180namespace dispatcher
181{
182
183template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
184          typename                  T,
185	  typename                  Block,
186	  typename                  OrderT,
187	  dimension_type            Dim >
188struct Evaluator<op::reduce_idx<ReduceT>, be::parallel,
189                 void(T&, Block const&, Index<Dim>&, OrderT)>
190{
191  static bool const ct_valid = 
192    !impl::Is_local_map<typename Block::map_type>::value &&
193    impl::Reduction_idx_supported<ReduceT,
194				  Dim,
195				  OrderT>::value;
196
197  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, Index<Dim>&, OrderT)
198  { return true; };
199
200  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, Index<Dim>& idx, OrderT)
201  {
202    r = impl::generic_par_idx_op<ReduceT,T>(a, idx);
203  }
204};
205
206} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
207} // namespace vsip_csl
208
209#endif // VSIP_OPT_REDUCTIONS_PAR_REDUCTIONS_HPP
